AI-Enhanced Management with EchoBot

An AI-integrated Telegram assistant that seamlessly navigates project inquiries, evolves its database through administrator feedback, and adeptly conforms to your official documentation or online platform nuances.

Why choose EchoBot?

In the always-on world of the crypto realm, users might pose intricate queries at unpredictable hours, and often, moderators may not have the immediate answers or might be unavailable. Our AI-integrated Telegram assistant is the perfect answer to this dilemma. The assistant familiarizes itself with every facet of your project, engaging with users as naturally as any human would. This equates to transparent, amiable, and prompt interactions for your community. What's even better? As the bot takes on the responsibility of addressing queries and updating users, you can concentrate on pivotal activities propelling your project's advancement.

Features:

Discover unparalleled Telegram bot engagement. Our offering doesn't just provide answers; it ensures a vibrant, lifelike conversation, anchored in up-to-the-minute data and steadfast backing. Delve into the features listed below and witness our redefinition of the Telegram bot experience.

- Engages users through natural conversations.
- Tackles all inquiries related to your project.
- Information foundation derived from your whitepaper, website,

or specified resources.

- Admin-driven instantaneous enhancement of the knowledge base.
- Consistent backing from our expert team within working hours.
- Integration with announcements for immediate knowledge updating.
- Tuned in to real-time blockchain metrics pertinent to your project/token.

Tokenomics

Token Allocation:

From our comprehensive count of 10,000,000 tokens, a significant 90%, translating to 9,000,000 tokens, have been directed towards our liquidity pool on Uniswap. Such a vast allocation guarantees a balanced trading atmosphere for our token. The remaining 10% is bifurcated uniformly: with 5% set aside for promotional activities to amplify EchoBot's visibility, and the other 5% channeled into our persistent R&D initiatives.

Transaction Charges:

EchoBot token transaction is subject to a 5% transaction fee. The distribution of this fee is as outlined:

1% is earmarked for technological enhancements, ensuring continuous development of the Mystic project. A larger portion, 4%, is designated for promotional endeavors, with the aim of broadening MysticBot's user base and market presence. Consequently, each transaction fuels EchoBot's expansion and reinforces its operational consistency.
